name: Baldi's Basics Placeholder Demo (Chapter 1)
description:
You started venturing into the placeholder lore once, and you became so obsessed that Baldi invited you to a placeholder school! But somebody blocks access to this academy...

Baldi still challenges you, and he brought new placeholders into the school so you can have "FUN"! However, like any other trip that Baldi takes you on, this one isn't likely to be too good either.
